Ingredients.3: 1 (16 ounce) jar spaghetti sauce, or as needed

Ingredients.4: 1 (2.25 ounce) can sliced black olives, drained

Ingredients.6: 1 (8 ounce) package sliced pepperoni, coarsely chopped

Directions.1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).

Directions.2: Cook the ground beef in a skillet over medium heat until no longer pink, breaking the meat apart into crumbles as it cooks, about 10 minutes.

Directions.3: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a rolling boil. Cook the egg noodles in the boiling water until cooked through yet slightly firm, about 5 minutes; drain.

Directions.4: Mix the noodles with the cooked ground beef, spaghetti sauce, black olives, mushrooms, pepperoni, and 1/2 of the mozzarella cheese in a large mixing bowl. Spoon the mixture into a 9x13-inch baking dish and top with remaining cheese. Cover the dish with foil.

Directions.5: Bake in the preheated oven until the casserole is bubbling, 30 to 45 minutes.
